attributes.action: Give Tax Relief on Purchase of Annual Tickets for Public Transport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently you can sign up for a salary sacrifice to pay for annual carparking tickets, giving you tax relief. This encourages the use of private cars.

I believe that if this government is serious about protecting the environment and encouraging the use of public transport that a similar salary sacrifice scheme should be available to buy annual public transport tickets.
